Enabled.Name: Hover Enabled
Enabled.Hint: Show the token note on hover.

DarkMode.Name: Dark Mode
DarkMode.Hint: Show the token note with light text on a dark background.

FontSize.Name: Text Size Override
FontSize.Hint: Override the base text size for the token note display. Example: 1.5rem.

MaxWidth.Name: Maximum Width
MaxWidth.Hint: The maximum width in px the token note display can grow to before it will force wrapping.

DisplayDelay.Name: Display Delay
DisplayDelay.Hint: How long before the token note display appears (in milliseconds).
